tool.name: Trjcat
tool.description: : Wrapper class for the GROMACS trjcat module.

param.name: input_trj_zip_path
param.label: input ZIP file
param.help: Path the input GROMACS trajectories (xtc, trr, cpt, gro, pdb, tng) to concatenate in zip format. Format: [input].zip

param.name: outname_output_trj_path
param.label: output PDB,GRO,XTC,TRR,TNG name
param.help: Path to the output trajectory file Format: [output].[format]

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: concatenate
param.label: concatenate
param.help: Only concatenate the files without removal of frames with identical timestamps.

param.name: gmx_lib
param.label: gmx_lib
param.help: Path set GROMACS GMXLIB environment variable.

param.name: binary_path
param.label: binary_path
param.help: Path to the GROMACS executable binary.
